official.headline: Tribunal for Transparency
official.anchor_line: The Council announces an open public tribunal to discuss the origins and purpose of the Behavioral Compliance Index.
official.contextual_reframing: This measured response demonstrates our system’s ongoing commitment to openness and collective improvement, ensuring continued stability for all citizens.

underground.headline: BCI Secrets Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Council and BCI engineers forced into the light—tribunal set, secrets spill out.
underground.contextual_reframing: After years of silence, Stenograd demands answers about rigged scores and hidden controls. The system can't hide forever.
